name: CARIVA (Thailand)

Our solutions provide the digitalization of healthcare ecosystem to support distribution of cutting-edge health technology and to generate solutions integrated with human digital twins. We provide data-driven insights to accelerate life-changing innovations in the hopes of better health outcome for all.

Headline: EMPOWER PEOPLE AND HEALTHCARE INDUSTRY.
ShortDescription: CARIVA is dedicated to making high value health-related data more accessible yet secured to individuals, healthcare professionals, researchers, and policy makers.
enhanced_description: CARIVA (Thailand) is an innovative health technology startup that leverages AI-enabled personalized healthcare and precision medicine. Their solutions digitalize the healthcare ecosystem, supporting the distribution of cutting-edge health technology and integrating with human digital twins. CARIVA provides data-driven insights to accelerate life-changing innovations, aiming for better health outcomes for all. The platform makes high-value health-related data accessible yet secured to individuals, healthcare professionals, researchers, and policy makers. Specific offerings include an AI-powered radiology assistant for organ and tumor volume measurement in CT scans, and a digital health platform utilizing AI to provide personalized insights and recommendations from wearables, medical records, and self-reports. This technology assists medical professionals in diagnosing and recommending treatments more accurately, comprehensively, and quickly.

Improving employee happiness and engagement through health support
